name: Not as it seems (Alexandre Lucas)
description:
You play as a knight trapped in a nightmare. During your boss fight trial you will have to be carefull: things might not be as they seem... Focus and observe, you may notice something's wrong. In this nervous third person boss fight game, your reflexes will have to be sharp if you want to kill the beast.

It's been done by 3 people
Sofiane Ben Embareck : Developper
Arnaud Guegherouni : VFX Artist
Alexandre Lucas : Game Designer

Input
- Dash => A or X or Space 
- Melee => X or Square or Left Click
- Shoot => RT or R2 or Right Click
- Move => Left stick or WASD 
- Aim => Right Stick or Mouse Position

Credits
UI : GUI Pro Kit https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/gui-pro-kit-fantasy-rpg-170168
Sounds : Fantasy Sounds Bundle https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/fantasy-sounds-bundle-19376...
Characters : RPG Fantasy Pack https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/fantasy/rpg-fantas...
Environment : Dark Fantasy Gigantic Environmnent https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/dark-fantasy-gigan...
